verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When the Music Fades
I start to cry
I remember the time
When i hear your Word
I start to search your Love and Kind

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I start to Cry
Deeper inlove with you
I feel surrender my life
To you with all my Heart.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
My Life you've Change
My Lord you are There
You Gave me Strength
You Gave me Hope
You are Lord of All
My Saviour

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
You are the Way
And your are the life(3x)
And your my Everything.
